errorpage-desc: Provides a destination for the 404/410 errors
errorpage-body: $1. Maybe you were looking "[{{fullurl:$2}} $2]"? There are currently no data on this page. You can [[Special:Search/{{PAGENAME}}|find a mention of the name]] on other pages, or [{{fullurl:{{#Special:Log}}|page={{FULLPAGENAMEE}}}} find related journal entries]. ⇢ Maybe you want to go to [[{{MediaWiki:Mainpage}}|the main page]]
errorpage-status-404: No data found for the given URL
errorpage-status-410: The page you requested has been deleted by the copyright holder
